findings.title: Deployer cannot renounce ownership
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the ability to renounce ownership.

findings.title: Deployer cannot transfer ownership
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the capability to transfer ownership.

findings.title: Deployer cannot burn
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the capability to burn tokens or destroy the contract.

findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot lock/pause contract
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the capability to lock or pause the contract after its initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot block users
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the capability to block users.
